name: A181 - West Dapto - ITC 012 (ITP012) - Spray Seal
template name: A181 - West Dapto - ITC 012 (ITP012) - Spray Seal

name: • HOLD POINT: Submit to the Principal documentation on material type, source, proportions, grading, application rates, test certificates and trial mix results as evidence of conformance for each constituent before commencing
• HOLD POINT: Submit to the Principal sprayed seal design details 2 weeks prior to commencing, with evidence that the design conforms to Austroads AGPT04K Clause 4
• HOLD POINT: Submit to the Principal evidence of plant and equipment registration and insurance 2 weeks prior to commencing
• HOLD POINT: Submit to the principal drawings and documents to final completed works
• Contractor supplied test certificates for dried back moisture % prior to spraying of primer, primer-binder or binder
• Perform embedment tests to Austroads AG:PT/T251 within 48 hours before spray application
• Pavement to be swept with a rotary road or suction broom prior to priming and extend sweeping 30mm beyond edge of spray area. Remove any foreign or loose material
• Do not commence spraying until any defects in the pavement surface are rectified
• Notify the Principal of inspection of a completed surfacing trial section
• Submit record of temperature and weather conditions during the course of the work. Record during regular intervals with appropriate measuring procedures. Record for both sun and shaded areas
• Submit to the Principal, spraying certificate, binder spraying temperature and work record for each spray run
• Notify the principal of the inspection of the spraying rate
• Test for all characteristics in conformance with maximum lot size and minimum frequencies
• Pavement surface prep is to be tested to the ball penetration Austroads test
• Submit test results within the maximum lot sizes and minimum test frequencies
• HOLD POINT: Notify the Principal 2 days prior to spreading aggregate for inspection of the completed sprayed surface
• Application rate is to conform to Austroads AGPT04K
• Measure application rates and quantities applied to the mixture at 15°C
• Primer drying period is at least 72 hours after application
• Binder application to conform to Clause 4.5
• Forward speed of bitumen sprayer is to be based on items in Clause 4.5

• HOLD POINT: Notify the Principal of inspection for completed rolled surface with linemarking, services fixtures and warning signs cleaned and in place prior to opening for traffic (if applicable), otherwise complete inspection of the swept surface
• Surface is to conform to Austroads AGPT04K and is generally of good quality
• Appearance is to be uniform, clean and with straight edges
• Loose aggregate is to be removed after sweeping and conform to Clause 4.10
• Provide warning signs for newly completed surfacing
• WITNESS POINT: Notify the Principal of inspection for completed remedial treatment of non-conforming sections
• Area not within 5% of the application rate are non-conforming
• Submit drawings and documents of final completed works. Contractor to provide Schedule 6.2 – Schedule of Job, Details of Works As Executed (WAE)
QA ENGINEER / SPE / PE SIGN OFF
